command.notConnected: You cannot use this feature because you are not on MoneyMaker.

timer.usage: Please use /mm-timer <Time in minutes> <name of the timer>
timer.no-number: <Time in minutes> must be a number.
timer.max-length: The timer name can be a maximum of %s characters long.
timer.already-exists: A timer with this name already exists.
timer.performance: Please note that the more timers you create, the performance loss may occur.
timer.created: The timer %s with %s minutes has been created.

reset.booster: Your saved booster data has been reset
reset.miners: Your saved miner data has been reset.
reset.debris: Your saved debris data has been reset.
reset.all: All saved data has been reset.

inventory.total: You have a total of %s Boosters in your Booster-Inventory, this corresponds to a total boost of %s.
inventory.info:
Please not that only boosters are recorded
that are currently visible in the inventory.

language-info.title: MoneyMaker Addon
language-info.line1: ℹ The MoneyMaker Addon currently only supports German and English ℹ
language-info.line2: You may need to change the language to 'German' or 'English' in the lobby or via '/language'.

request.chatNotConnected: You are currently not connected to the chat server.
request.sent: A request to our Server has been sent, awaiting server response
request.failed: Failed to create an token for your account. Reason: %s

website.success: Your token has been create successfully. Please finish your registration at the following link:

discord.success: Your token has been create successfully. Please join our Discord to link your Discord Account
discord.tokenHover: Click to copy the token to your clipboard

activity.serverResponseInfo: If the Popup does not update in a few seconds, please contact us via Discord.
activity.error: There was an error while creating your token. Please contact us via Discord.
activity.closeInfo: Please close the Window only after you have used your Token.
activity.tokenGenerated: Your Token has been generated. Do not share this Token with anyone!

website.infoText: Please use this Token to register your Minecraft Account on our Website by clicking on the Button below.

discord.copied: Your Token has been copied to your Clipboard.
discord.infoText2: 2. Use the Command '/link' in the Channel %s

booster-export.title: Booster-Export
booster-export.no-boosters: There are no boosters to export.
booster-export.saved: The overview of your found boosters has been saved.

chat.title: Addon-Chat
chat.connected: Successfully connected to the chat server.
chat.no-connection: Unable to connect to the chat server.

rank-changed.title: Your rank has been changed
rank-changed.text: Your rank has been changed to %s.

farming.title: Leave farming cave
farming.question: Do you want to reset the block, kill and booster counters?
farming.done: Your block, kill and booster counters have been reset.

profile.title: Profile switch detected
profile.text: The collected data has been reset due to the profile switch

break-goal.title: Break Goal
break-goal.text: You have reached your break goal in %s!
break-goal.set: You have set your break goal to %s blocks.
break-goal.no-number: Please enter a number as input.

miner.title: Money for workers reached!
miner.text: You have reached the money for the next miner.

debris.title: Money for debris reached!
debris.text: You have reached the money to remove the debris.

leaderboard.title: MoneyMaker - Leaderboard

blocks.enabled: Your blocks will now be shown.
blocks.disabled: Your blocks will now be hidden.
blocks.info: Please note that this setting will only be saved when you close the game or leave GommeHD.net.

leaderboard.coolDown: Please wait before refreshing the Leaderboard.

description.title: Description
description.placeholder: Please describe your request in detail

invalid.title: Invalid Feedback Form
invalid.invalidDate: The entered date is not valid. Please use %s as format
invalid.descriptionShort: The entered description is too short. At least %s characters required
invalid.noAttachment: Please provide an attachment, since you selected Bugreport as Type
invalid.noUrl: You must enter a url as attachment

success.title: Feedback Form has been sent
success.text: The form was submitted successfully. Thank you for your feedback

form.title: Mute %s
form.reason: Enter the reason for the mute

invalid.title: Invalid Mute Form
invalid.noStaff: You are not a staff member
invalid.noReason: You must provide a reason for the mute
invalid.chatError: There was an error while contacting the Chat-Server
invalid.invalidDuration: The duration of the mute is invalid

success.title: Mute has been sent
success.text:
%s has been successfully muted.
Reason: %s
Duration: %s

invalid.title: Invalid Report Form
invalid.chatError: There was an error while contacting the Chat-Server

createWebsiteAccount.name: Create Website Account
createWebsiteAccount.description: Create an Account for our Website for submitting Feedback and other features

linkDiscordAccount.name: Link Discord Account
linkDiscordAccount.description: Link your Minecraft Account to your Discord Account so that ranks can be synchronized and to use other features

showBlocksInLeaderboard.name: Show own Blocks in Leaderboard
showBlocksInLeaderboard.description: Show your blocks in the leaderboard on the website (enabled by default)

showCustomGameSwitchNotifications.name: Show Custom Game Mode Switch Notification
showCustomGameSwitchNotifications.description:
Shows Custom Game Mode Switch Notifications to your friends.
For example switching Cave Levels in the Farming Cave

exportBoosterOnShutdown.name: Export found boosters on shutdown
exportBoosterOnShutdown.description:
Exports your found boosters when you exit the game.
The file will be saved in {game-directory}/MoneyMaker

farmingAutoReset.name: Reset counters when leaving farming cave
farmingAutoReset.description: Change the behavior for resetting the counters when leaving the farming cave

resetOnProfileSwitch.name: Reset data on profile switch
resetOnProfileSwitch.description: Resets the collected data automatically when switching the profile

showWidgetsAlways.name: Show Widgets always
showWidgetsAlways.description: Show widgets that are normally only visible in the farming cave also in the mine

updateMode.name: Data processing speed
updateMode.description: Data processing speed (rendering ArmorStands, querying sword statistics)

showTotalBoostMessage.name: Show total boost message
showTotalBoostMessage.description: Displays a message in chat with the total boost of your boosters in the booster inventory when you close the booster inventory

showMOTD.name: Show Message of the day
showMOTD.description: Displays the message of the day when joining MoneyMaker

showBoosterIcon.name: Show Booster Icon
showBoosterIcon.description: Displays the icon of the found booster in the shortened booster message

hideEmptyMessages.name: Hide Empty Messages
hideEmptyMessages.description: Hides empty messages and divider messages

notifyOnMoneyReached.name: Notification when money for workers/debris reached

showTimersOnEffect.name: Show clickable timers in chat
showTimersOnEffect.description: Displays a clickable message in chat to activate a timer when a worker's effect activates.

showLocation.name: Show current Location
showLocation.description: Shows your current Location (Mine or Farming cave)

showStats.name: Show Statistics
showStats.description:
Shows your statistics

Mine: Balance, Worker count, Ranking

Farming cave: Broken Blocks, Found Boosters, Pickaxe Rank & Level, Ranking

showDetailedLocation.name: Shows your current Location with Details
showDetailedLocation.description: Shows in the Farming Cave your current Cave level (Gold, Coal, Iron) and in the Mine your current Mine (Gold, Coal, Iron and Lapis Mine) in the Discord Rich Presence

loadChatHistory.name: Load Chat History
loadChatHistory.description: Load the Chat history when connecting to GommeHD.net. The History contains the last 50 sent messages and will be displayed in the MoneyMaker Chat Tab

showDetailedLocation.name: Shows your current Location with Details
showDetailedLocation.description: Shows in the Farming Cave your current Cave level (Gold, Coal, Iron) and in the Mine your current Mine (Gold, Coal, Iron and Lapis Mine) in the Addon Chat online list

notification.name: Notifications
notification.description: Receive notification of new messages via the addon chat

notificationSound.name: Notification sound
notificationSound.description: Receive a notification sound for new messages via the addon chat

break-goal.title: Break Goal
break-goal.description: Should the break goal function be activated?
break-goal.input-description: Enter the break goal you want to achieve.

verify.description: Verify your account with your discord account or your website account

leaderboard.title: MoneyMaker Leaderboard
leaderboard.liveDataInfo:
This leaderboard is not based on live data,
so duplicate ranking and out-of-date information may occur.
leaderboard.noData:
An error occurred!
No data has been received from the server

chat.title: MoneyMaker Addon Chat
chat.server-offline: The chat server is currently not available.

server.error: There was an error while contacting the Chat-Server

muted.title: You have been muted from the chat.

disconnect.timeout: Disconnected from Server due to inactivity
disconnect.notPremium: The account is not a Minecraft premium Account
